# changeLayoutOrientation(_:)

**Instance Method**

An action method that sets the layout orientation of the text.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func changeLayoutOrientation(_ sender: Any?)
```

## Parameters

- **sender**: The sender.

## Discussion

Calls [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextView/setLayoutOrientation(_:)] with the sender’s tag as the orientation.

## Changing layout orientation

- **setLayoutOrientation(_:)**: Changes the receiver’s layout orientation and invalidates the contents.
